siteDescription: A compact multilingual blog showcasing modern web development with Next.js App Router.
aboutDescription: Learn more about Mini-Blog — a compact yet powerful multilingual project designed to showcase modern web development.

aboutPage.intro: Welcome to Mini-Blog — a small but mighty multilingual blog project.
aboutPage.team: This project was created by an imaginary team of developers who love clean code, accessibility, and beautiful design.
aboutPage.mission: Our mission is to demonstrate how even a small blog can be built with modern tools like Next.js App Router, TypeScript, and SCSS modules — while supporting multiple languages and a great developer experience.
aboutPage.open: This project is open for learning, experimenting, and contributing.
